item.name: Space as global modifier
item.appendix: * When tapped, space key send space
* When held, space key acts as my Mac "global modifier" combo (ctrl+cmd+option)
* When space key and another key overlap, and space is released first, send space
Based on the sample SandS 2 script which maintains space key behavior while fast typing.
